headline: Hillbilly Eulogy
author: Robert Kuttner
sentences: In a Senate race between a fake populist who became a hedge fund exec and a real populist—most likely Tim Ryan—who correctly blames structural factors rather than bad personal behavior for disappearing jobs, the real populist has the advantage.
